import React, {useEffect} from 'react' import { useParams, Link } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from '../apis/axios' import { useGlobalContext } from '../globalContext' const ReviewRestaurantForm = ({reviews}) => { const {id} = useParams() const { setReviewIndex, reviewerName, setReviewerName, reviewerComment, setReviewerComment, reviewerRating, setReviewerRating } = useGlobalContext() useEffect(() => { setReviewerName('') setReviewerComment('') setReviewerRating('Rating') }, []) const handleAddReview = async event => { event.preventDefault() try { await axios.post(`/${id}/reviews`, { name: reviewerName, review: reviewerComment, rating: reviewerRating }) setReviewerName('') setReviewerComment('') setReviewerRating('Rating') setReviewIndex(reviews.length - 1) window.location.reload(true); } catch (error) { console.log(error) } } //rendering component return (
setReviewerName(event.target.value)} />
